name: Death Car Xtreme: Rally Race
description:
Death Car Xtreme: Rally Race is a death racer game so either kill or be killed. No speed limit and no mercy for what comes on the way, just blow them with lethal weapons. you choose the lethal weapons and vehicles and race for their freedom in this game.
Features
Only the missile can shot down the helicopter.
Shoot Cars to get coins
Buy Missiles and ammo with coins
Buy cars with coins for difficult missions
Brake to avoid the ground bombing of missile.
